Vendor: J76 Bamboo Wear

May is made to to lounge and travels well whether it be from the studio to the street. Tapered leg design with convenient side pockets and elastic waistband plus drawstring waist. Full length to the ankle. Cuffed ankle makes the pant leg length adjustable. Wear it high or low for different looks. Relaxed fit. 

Model is 5'5/165cm with a 27" waist, inseam 27.5" wearing a size S.

MADE IN VANCOUVER, B.C. CANADA
